titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: POSTCODE OF TESTING SERVICE (CHLAMYDIA TESTING) - Description

div.p: POSTCODE OF TESTING SERVICE (CHLAMYDIA TESTING) is the same as data element POSTCODE.

POSTCODE OF TESTING SERVICE (CHLAMYDIA TESTING) is the POSTCODE of the chlamydia testing service address where the ADDRESS ASSOCIATION TYPE is National Code 'Main Business Premises' or 'Other Business Premises'.
POSTCODE OF TESTING SERVICE (CHLAMYDIA TESTING) is the POSTCODE of the ORGANISATION where the chlamydia test SAMPLE was taken.
